text: Comblain-au-Pont is a municipality in the Belgian province of Liège. In 2013, 5359 people lived there (2603 men and 2756 women). It is at 50° 28 North, 05° 34 East. == References == ==Other websites== * * Maison du Tourisme Ourthe- Amblève Category:Municipalities of Liège
title: Comblain-au-Pont
